title: Chaos outside the Kabul airport as Taliban confronts fleeing Afghans
author: ABC News
description:
U.S. forces said they're in talks with the Taliban, but the evacuation is anything but orderly.

localize.title: 喀布尔机场外一片混乱，塔利班与逃亡的阿富汗人对峙。
喀布爾機場外一片混亂，塔利班與逃亡的阿富汗人對峙。
